fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Sacrifice a Good Faction member to haunt another player.

fields.name: Atributes:
fields.value:
- The player you sacrifice will be killed by an Overkill Attack.
- The player you haunt will be killed by an Unstoppable Attack.
- If you try to sacrifice a non-Good member, you will instead sacrifice yourself. This stops being the case if there are no Good players alive.
- If you try to haunt a Good player, you will only be able to sacrifice people for the rest of the game.
- You are unable to use your ability more than once per night even if another effect would try to allow you to do more.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.
